translated: It is the reality realm without beginning or end, the nature of the mind and mental factors of Akshobhya, because it pervades everything.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: dam tshig chen po nyid gcig pu //
analyzed: dam tshig chen po nyid gcig pu //
translated: The great commitment itself is one.

original: 'di ni dam tshig chen por bshad //
analyzed: 'di ni dam tshig chen por bshad //
translated: This is explained as the great commitment.

original: ces gsungs pa dang / thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
analyzed: ces gsungs pa dang / thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
translated: The beginningless and endless hero

original: zhes bya ba la sogs par bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs par bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o //
translated: Thus, the Blessed One has spoken.

original: de'i de kho na nyid ni rab tu dga' ba'i de kho na nyid dang kun du bzang po nyid do //
analyzed: de'i de kho na nyid ni rab tu dga' ba'i de kho na nyid dang kun du bzang po nyid do //
translated: Its reality is the reality of the Joyous and the Universal Good.🔽Thus, it is said:

original: de skad du dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de skad du dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is the reality of the Great Commitment?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: rab tu dga' ba dang / kun du bzang po'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba dang / kun du bzang po'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The Joyous and the Universal Good.

original: de nyid ni rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni rdo rje'o //
translated: That itself is the vajra.

original: de ltar na dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sgra 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' bshad par gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sgra 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' bshad par gyur pa yin no //
translated: Thus, by the term “reality of the Great Commitment vajra,” the Blessed Vajrasattva is indicated.

original: de'i byin gyis rlob pa ni gzhal yas khang ste /
analyzed: de'i byin gyis rlob pa ni gzhal yas khang ste /
translated: Its consecration is the celestial mansion,

original: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: which is the meaning of “maṇḍala.”

original: de ltar na de skad ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na de skad ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Thus, that which is called by that name is the great maṇḍala.

original: 'di skad ces bya ba ni blo la bzhag pa 'das ma thag nyid du bshad par bya ba bstan pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di skad ces bya ba ni blo la bzhag pa 'das ma thag nyid du bshad par bya ba bstan pa nyid do //
translated: This is what is called just spoken is the very teaching that was placed in the mind.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
translated: The word then is immediately after.

original: sngar bsnyen pa byas pa'i rjes thogs nyid la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sngar bsnyen pa byas pa'i rjes thogs nyid la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that immediately after the prior service.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu ste gang gi @76b phyir dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med par skal ba med pa rnams la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bstan par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu ste gang gi @76b phyir dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med par skal ba med pa rnams la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bstan par mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore is the reason, because without entering the maṇḍala, the buddhas and bodhisattvas should not be shown to those who are unfortunate.

original: der zhugs na grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: der zhugs na grub par 'gyur te /
translated: If they enter there, they will be accomplished.

original: de bas na de rnams kyi bag chags bskrun par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na de rnams kyi bag chags bskrun par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, in order to plant the latent tendencies of those,

original: yang dag par rab tu rnam par phye ste bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rab tu rnam par phye ste bshad par bya'o //
translated: it should be explained, having thoroughly analyzed.

original: ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig ce na /
translated: What is it?

original: dkyil 'khor dam pa ste zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dam pa ste zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is said, the supreme maṇḍala.

original: ming ji skad du btags she na /
analyzed: ming ji skad du btags she na /
translated: What is its name?

original: de nyid dang po dam tshig che zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid dang po dam tshig che zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ste /
translated: That very one is called the great pledge... and so forth.

original: dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid ni bshad zin to //
translated: The great pledge reality has been explained.

original: dang po'i rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: The first vajra is Vajrasattva.

original: de'i byin gyi rlabs ni dkyil 'khor te /🔽gang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' sprul par mdzad pa de la ming de skad ces mtshungs par brjod cing ming 'dogs pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de'i byin gyi rlabs ni dkyil 'khor te / gang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' sprul par mdzad pa de la ming de skad ces mtshungs par brjod cing ming 'dogs pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: His blessing is the mandala.🔽That which is called by that name, the one who is called by that name,🔽the great pledge reality blessing mandala, is the one who is the same as the Bhagavat Vajrasattva emanation.

original: dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i kha dog dang / dbyibs kyi bdag nyid can dag kyang gang sprul pa dang 'dra bar bris pa yin pas de la yang ming 'di skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i kha dog dang / dbyibs kyi bdag nyid can dag kyang gang sprul pa dang 'dra bar bris pa yin pas de la yang ming 'di skad ces bya'o //
translated: Since it is drawn like the emanation, it is also called by that name.

original: gru bzhir bgyi zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni kha dog dbyibs kyi bdag nyid can gyi gzugs can dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: gru bzhir bgyi zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni kha dog dbyibs kyi bdag nyid can gyi gzugs can dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The one with four corners, etc. is the mandala with the nature of color and shape that is taught.

original: phyogs bzhi'i ri mo dang ldan pa ni gru bzhi'o //
analyzed: phyogs bzhi'i ri mo dang ldan pa ni gru bzhi'o //
translated: The one with lines in the four directions is the one with four corners.

original: de yang gang gi phyir ngos kyi ri mo la bya'o //
analyzed: de yang gang gi phyir ngos kyi ri mo la bya'o //
translated: Moreover, it is said that the mandala should be drawn on a level surface.

original: dbus kyi ri mo'i phyogs bzhir cha brgyad pa'i sgo bzhi dang ldan pa ni sgo bzhi dang zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dbus kyi ri mo'i phyogs bzhir cha brgyad pa'i sgo bzhi dang ldan pa ni sgo bzhi dang zhes bya'o //
translated: The four doors are endowed with four door-sections, each of which is one-eighth of the central mandala.

original: sgo de'i phyed kyi tshad kyi khyams kyis skor phyogs su phyi rol kun nas bskor la rta babs dang bcas par bya ba ni /
analyzed: sgo de'i phyed kyi tshad kyi khyams kyis skor phyogs su phyi rol kun nas bskor la rta babs dang bcas par bya ba ni /
translated: The outer enclosure is all around the outside, with porticos, and is the size of half of the door.

original: khyams rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o //🔽sgo rnams su ni sgo'i sum 'gyur gyi chad kyi rta babs bzhi dang ldan par bya ba ni /
analyzed: khyams rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o // sgo rnams su ni sgo'i sum 'gyur gyi chad kyi rta babs bzhi dang ldan par bya ba ni /
translated: It is said to be completely surrounded by porticos.🔽The four porticos are the size of three door-sections and are at the doors.

original: rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
translated: It is said to be endowed with four porticos.

original: zhes bya'o // 'od zer de nyid 'bar ba yin pas na 'od zer 'bar ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya'o // 'od zer de nyid 'bar ba yin pas na 'od zer 'bar ba ste /
translated: Since the light-rays are blazing, they are blazing light-rays.

original: de nyid kyis 'khrigs pa'i 'od gang yin pa de ni 'od zer 'bar pas 'khrigs pa'i 'od ces bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis 'khrigs pa'i 'od gang yin pa de ni 'od zer 'bar pas 'khrigs pa'i 'od ces bya'o //
translated: The light which is enveloped by them is the light enveloped by blazing light-rays.

original: mtshams su ri mo gnyis 'dus pa ni /
analyzed: mtshams su ri mo gnyis 'dus pa ni /
translated: The two lines which meet at the corners

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi grva zhes bya ste ;
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi grva zhes bya ste ;
translated: are called the corners of all the mandalas.

original: de rnams dang sgo khyud kyi mtshams rnams su zhes bya ba la sgo rnams kyi sgo khyud ni sgo khyud de mdzes pa dang rjes su mdzes pa zhes bya ba thad kar byung ba sgo'i phyed kyi tshad du rtsig pa ston pa'i ri mo'o //
analyzed: de rnams dang sgo khyud kyi mtshams rnams su zhes bya ba la sgo rnams kyi sgo khyud ni sgo khyud de mdzes pa dang rjes su mdzes pa zhes bya ba thad kar byung ba sgo'i phyed kyi tshad du rtsig pa ston pa'i ri mo'o //
translated: In the corners of the doors and door-frames means that the door-frames of the doors are the door-frames. Beautiful and lovely means that the lines of the walls, which are half the size of the doors, are straight.

original: de rnams kyi mtshams su ni ri mo gnyis 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi mtshams su ni ri mo gnyis 'dus pa'o //
translated: The corners are where the two lines meet.

original: de dag tu zla ba phyed pa la rab tu gnas pa @77a * //
analyzed: de dag tu zla ba phyed pa la rab tu gnas pa @77a * //
translated: Half-moons are situated there.

original: ni ; zla ba phyed pa la rab tu gnas shing 'dug pa ste de yang rdo rje rtse lnga dang / rdo rje rin po che dang / rdo rje padma dang / sna tshogs rdo rjes nye bar mdzes par byas shing brgyan pa ni rin chen kun gyis nye bar mdzes pa ste /
analyzed: ni ; zla ba phyed pa la rab tu gnas shing 'dug pa ste de yang rdo rje rtse lnga dang / rdo rje rin po che dang / rdo rje padma dang / sna tshogs rdo rjes nye bar mdzes par byas shing brgyan pa ni rin chen kun gyis nye bar mdzes pa ste /
translated: Adorned with half-moons means that they are beautified and ornamented with half-moons, and also with five-pronged vajras, vajra jewels, vajra lotuses, and crossed vajras. Adorned with all jewels means that they are beautified with all jewels.

original: tha ma kha dog lnga pas mdzes par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tha ma kha dog lnga pas mdzes par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of beautified with the five colors is that they are beautified with the five colors.

original: rtse mo sna tshogs pa yang de nyid yin la /
analyzed: rtse mo sna tshogs pa yang de nyid yin la /
translated: The variety of peaks is just that.

original: ba dan yang de nyid yin pas rtse mo sna tshogs ba dan no //
analyzed: ba dan yang de nyid yin pas rtse mo sna tshogs ba dan no //
translated: The banner is also that, so the top is the variegated banner.

original: dril bu'i mchog ni dam pa'o //
analyzed: dril bu'i mchog ni dam pa'o //
translated: The supreme bell is the best.

original: de brtags pa ni rtogs pa ste rtse mo sna tshogs la bya'o //
analyzed: de brtags pa ni rtogs pa ste rtse mo sna tshogs la bya'o //
translated: The investigation of that is the realization, which is to be done on the top.

original: de la shar phyogs kyi sgo khyud kyi mtshams dang / shar lho'i mtshams su ni rdo rje rtse lnga pas nye bar mdzes par bya ba'o ;
analyzed: de la shar phyogs kyi sgo khyud kyi mtshams dang / shar lho'i mtshams su ni rdo rje rtse lnga pas nye bar mdzes par bya ba'o ;
translated: In that, the eastern door-jambs and the southeast corner are beautified by the five-pronged vajra.

original: / gzhan dag tu yang go rims ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje rin po che la sogs pas nye bar mdzes par bya'o //
analyzed: / gzhan dag tu yang go rims ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje rin po che la sogs pas nye bar mdzes par bya'o //
translated: And in the others, also, it is to be beautified by the vajra jewel, etc., in the proper order.

original: rtse mor sna tshogs ba dan ni //
analyzed: rtse mor sna tshogs ba dan ni //
translated: The top is the variegated banner.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rtse mo'i cha kha dog lnga pa ni /🔽rtse mo sna tshogs pa'i ba dan gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rtse mo'i cha kha dog lnga pa ni / rtse mo sna tshogs pa'i ba dan gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: And so on. The part of the top, which is five-colored,🔽is that which is the variegated banner on the top.

original: de yang dkyil 'khor du rlung gis bskyod cing g-yengs pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: de yang dkyil 'khor du rlung gis bskyod cing g-yengs pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: And that is called the banner because it is moved and shaken by the wind in the mandala.

original: khyad par du bya pa'i rnam par dbye bas gzhan pa'i tshig gi phrad do //
analyzed: khyad par du bya pa'i rnam par dbye bas gzhan pa'i tshig gi phrad do //
translated: The other words are particles that specify.

original: me tog gi chun 'phyang ni me tog gi phreng ba'o //
analyzed: me tog gi chun 'phyang ni me tog gi phreng ba'o //
translated: The flower garlands are flower wreaths.

original: me long ni go bar zad de /
analyzed: me long ni go bar zad de /
translated: The mirrors are understood.

original: de dag gis spras pa ni brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gis spras pa ni brgyan pa'o //
translated: Adorned with those is ornamented.

original: phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
analyzed: phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
translated: One should draw the outer maṇḍala.

original: zhes bya ba ni thams cad la shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thams cad la shes par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood for all.🔽In the center of that, etc.

original: de'i nang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: de'i nang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The center of the maṇḍala explained above is the maṇḍala called the “wheel.”

original: 'khor lo dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad //
analyzed: 'khor lo dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad //
translated: The wheel maṇḍala is well explained.

original: ces gsungs pas sgra 'di ni zlum po 'ba' zhig ston pa'i tshig ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ces gsungs pas sgra 'di ni zlum po 'ba' zhig ston pa'i tshig ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, this term is not a word that only indicates a circle.

original: dkyil 'khor brgyad dang mnyam pa ru ;🔽/ zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor brgyad dang mnyam pa ru ; / zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Equal to the eight maṇḍalas.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad ni dkyil 'khor brgyad de /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad ni dkyil 'khor brgyad de /
translated: The eight liberations are the eight maṇḍalas.

original: de'i rgyu mthun pa las byung ba kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid can rnam par thar pa brgyad ston par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor gang bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul par mdzad pa de yang dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ste /
analyzed: de'i rgyu mthun pa las byung ba kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid can rnam par thar pa brgyad ston par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor gang bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul par mdzad pa de yang dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ste /
translated: The mandala that the Bhagavān emanated, which is the cause of the eight liberations, is the nature of color and shape.

original: de dang mnyam par gang bris pa de ni dkyil 'khor brgyad dang mnyam pa ru zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de dang mnyam par gang bris pa de ni dkyil 'khor brgyad dang mnyam pa ru zhes bya'o //
translated: That which is drawn equal to that is called “equal to the eight mandalas.”

original: de la rnam par thar pa brgyad ni gzugs can gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba na de stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par zil gyis gnon pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o //
analyzed: de la rnam par thar pa brgyad ni gzugs can gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba na de stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par zil gyis gnon pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o //
translated: The eight liberations are as follows: When one sees forms with a form body, the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness of that is the first liberation.

original: nang gzugs @77b su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: nang gzugs @77b su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o //
translated: The perception of internal form and the seeing of external forms is the second liberation.

original: bsam gtan gsum pa snga ma bzhin du mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa snga ma bzhin du mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o //
translated: The seeing of the third concentration as before is the third liberation.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ni bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ni bzhi pa'o //
translated: The sphere of infinite space is the fourth.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched ni lnga pa'o //
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched ni lnga pa'o //
translated: The sphere of infinite consciousness is the fifth.

original: ci yang med pa'i skye mched ni drug pa'o //
analyzed: ci yang med pa'i skye mched ni drug pa'o //
translated: The sphere of nothingness is the sixth.

original: yod min med min skye mched ni bdun pa'o //
analyzed: yod min med min skye mched ni bdun pa'o //
translated: The sphere of neither perception nor non-perception is the seventh.

original: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni brgyad pa ste /
analyzed: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni brgyad pa ste /
translated: The attainment of cessation is the eighth.

original: snga ma bzhin du mthong ba zhes bya ba ni thams cad la shes par bya'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du mthong ba zhes bya ba ni thams cad la shes par bya'o //
translated: As before, “seeing” should be understood in all cases.

original: rdo rje thig gis thig btab pa //
analyzed: rdo rje thig gis thig btab pa //
translated: The vajra line is drawn with a vajra.

original: zhes bya ba ni gang dkyil 'khor brgyad dang mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor gang zhig bshad pa'i de nyid ni rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phreng bas phyi rol nas kun du bskor ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gang dkyil 'khor brgyad dang mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor gang zhig bshad pa'i de nyid ni rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phreng bas phyi rol nas kun du bskor ba'o //
translated: The maṇḍala that is equal to the eight maṇḍalas, which is explained, is completely surrounded on the outside by a garland of three-pointed vajras.

original: rdo rje 'khor lo zhes byar bshad //
analyzed: rdo rje 'khor lo zhes byar bshad //
translated: It is explained as the vajra wheel.

original: ces bya ba ni ming de skad ces bshad de zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni ming de skad ces bshad de zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is explained with that name, is the meaning.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni dbu ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni dbu ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi'o //
translated: “There” means in the middle maṇḍala.

original: dbus su zhes bya ba ni dbu ma'i phyogs te lte ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbus su zhes bya ba ni dbu ma'i phyogs te lte ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In the center means in the central direction, which is to say, at the navel.

original: ci rigs par zhes bya ba ni sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs pa sngar byas te ji lta ba bzhin du dgos par bya'o zhes bya bar ston pa yin te /
analyzed: ci rigs par zhes bya ba ni sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs pa sngar byas te ji lta ba bzhin du dgos par bya'o zhes bya bar ston pa yin te /
translated: As is appropriate means that one should do what is necessary, having previously performed the preliminary practices and so forth, as is appropriate.

original: de dag ni phyis bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag ni phyis bshad par bya'o //
translated: These will be explained later.

original: sangs rgyas sku ni zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas sku ni zhes bya ba la /
translated: The Buddha's body means

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'i gzugs brnyan te /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'i gzugs brnyan te /
translated: the reflection of Vajrasattva's body.

original: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin du bshad //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin du bshad //
translated: It is explained as the Buddha Vajradhara.

original: ces 'di nyid kyi 'og nas gsungs pa dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor gnyis pa yin pas de'i phyir yang som nyi mi bya'o //
analyzed: ces 'di nyid kyi 'og nas gsungs pa dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor gnyis pa yin pas de'i phyir yang som nyi mi bya'o //
translated: This is stated just below, and since the mandala of Vairocana is the second mandala, one should not doubt this.

original: 'dzum bcas zhes bya ba la cung zad bshad pa ni 'dzum pa'o //
analyzed: 'dzum bcas zhes bya ba la cung zad bshad pa ni 'dzum pa'o //
translated: Smiling means a little bit of speech is a smile.

original: de dad bcas par bzhugs pa la 'dzum bcas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de dad bcas par bzhugs pa la 'dzum bcas zhes bya'o //
translated: He who is seated with that is said to be smiling.

original: zla ba'i mdog can la zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
analyzed: zla ba'i mdog can la zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
translated: Having the color of the moon means that is understood.

original: rdo rje snyems pa 'dzin pa'i mchog / ces bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje snyems pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje snyems pa 'dzin pa'i mchog / ces bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje snyems pa ste /
translated: The best of vajra-conceited holders is the great seal of Vajrasattva, who is the vajra-conceited one.

original: de yang bshad zin to //
analyzed: de yang bshad zin to //
translated: This has already been explained.

original: rdo rje 'dzin par mdzad pas na rdo rje snyems pa 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin par mdzad pas na rdo rje snyems pa 'dzin pa'o //
translated: He is the vajra-conceited holder because he is the maker of the vajra-holder.

original: mchog ni dam pa'o //🔽rdo rje phreng ba sogs kyis spras shing zhes bya ba ni brgyan pa ste /
analyzed: mchog ni dam pa'o // rdo rje phreng ba sogs kyis spras shing zhes bya ba ni brgyan pa ste /
translated: The best is the supreme.🔽Adorned with a vajra garland, etc.

original: de la dang po dbu rgyan de nas sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba de nas padma'i phreng ba de nas rdo rje rin po che'i phred ba /🔽de nas spyi bo'i gnas nas brtsams te /
analyzed: de la dang po dbu rgyan de nas sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba de nas padma'i phreng ba de nas rdo rje rin po che'i phred ba / de nas spyi bo'i gnas nas brtsams te /
translated: means ornamented. Therein, first the crown, then the garland of the vajra cross, then the garland of the lotus, then the garland of the vajra gem.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lngas brgyan par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lngas brgyan par bya ste /
translated: Then, beginning from the place of the head, one should ornament with the five Tathagatas.

original: de ltar na sku gzugs de ni rdo rje phreng ba la sogs pas spras par 'gyur ro //🔽sna @78a * //
analyzed: de ltar na sku gzugs de ni rdo rje phreng ba la sogs pas spras par 'gyur ro // sna @78a * //
translated: Thus, that image becomes adorned with a vajra garland, etc.

original: tshogs 'bar ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od //
analyzed: tshogs 'bar ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od //
translated: The light of the blazing mass of various

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: dmar po dang ljang gu dang / sngon po dang / ser po dang / dkar po'i mdog can gyi ri mo sna tshogs pas 'bar ba ni sna tshogs 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: dmar po dang ljang gu dang / sngon po dang / ser po dang / dkar po'i mdog can gyi ri mo sna tshogs pas 'bar ba ni sna tshogs 'bar ba'o //
translated: The blazing of various colors, red, green, blue, yellow, and white, is the blazing of various colors.

original: de nyid ni 'khrigs pa'i 'od de /
analyzed: de nyid ni 'khrigs pa'i 'od de /
translated: That itself is the light of the mass.

original: de lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: One who has such a circle of light is so called.

original: padma'i gdan la bzhugs par ni //
analyzed: padma'i gdan la bzhugs par ni //
translated: Seated on a lotus seat.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is said.

original: sna tshogs padma'i sdong bu dang bcas pa'i steng du sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs padma'i sdong bu dang bcas pa'i steng du sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
translated: On top of a stalk of a variegated lotus, he sits in the cross-legged posture of a bodhisattva.

original: lugs ma zhes bya ba ni gser la sogs pa'i rdzas las sku'i gzugs brnyan du byas pa'o //
analyzed: lugs ma zhes bya ba ni gser la sogs pa'i rdzas las sku'i gzugs brnyan du byas pa'o //
translated: The statue is made of gold and other substances, a representation of the body.

original: mngon par 'du byas pa'o zhes bya ba ni lag gis las su byas pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par 'du byas pa'o zhes bya ba ni lag gis las su byas pa'o //
translated: The creation is made by the hand.

original: rang gi snying po kun bzlas te //
analyzed: rang gi snying po kun bzlas te //
translated: Reciting one's own essence mantra,

original: de tshe dkyil 'khor blta bar bya //
analyzed: de tshe dkyil 'khor blta bar bya //
translated: at that time one should see the mandala.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi rang gi snying po ni yi ge h'um ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi rang gi snying po ni yi ge h'um ste /
translated: And so forth. The Blessed One's own essence mantra is the syllable hūṃ.

original: de bzlas la dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa la sogs pa thams cad bya'o //
analyzed: de bzlas la dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa la sogs pa thams cad bya'o //
translated: Reciting that, one should perform all the rites such as the maṇḍala lines, and so forth.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa //
translated: All the vajra beings such as Vajrasattva,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: and so forth,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa thams cad h'um nyid kyis yang dag par dgod par bya zhing gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa thams cad h'um nyid kyis yang dag par dgod par bya zhing gzhag par bya'o //
translated: all the vajra beings such as Vajrasattva, Vajracaṇḍa, and so forth, should be placed by means of the syllable hūṃ.

original: de la ji ltar dgod par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar dgod par bya zhe na /
translated: How should they be placed?

original: rdo rje shugs kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje shugs kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The text says, “with the vajra speed,” and so forth.

original: de la rdo rje shugs ni 'di yin te /🔽bdag nyid rdo rje shugs kyis ni //
analyzed: de la rdo rje shugs ni 'di yin te / bdag nyid rdo rje shugs kyis ni //
translated: Here, the vajra speed is as follows:

original: rdo rje rdo rje zhes smras pa //
analyzed: rdo rje rdo rje zhes smras pa //
translated: One should say “vajra vajra”🔽with the speed of the vajra.

original: rdo rje shugs zhes bshad pa ste //
analyzed: rdo rje shugs zhes bshad pa ste //
translated: This is explained as the vajra speed,

original: kun du 'gro ba grub pa'o //
analyzed: kun du 'gro ba grub pa'o //
translated: the accomplishment of the universal.

original: zhes bya ba 'dis nang gi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa las byung ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis nang gi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa las byung ste /
translated: By this, having arisen from the inner maṇḍala, and so forth,

original: rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa la dkyil 'khor thams cad du yang dag par bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa la dkyil 'khor thams cad du yang dag par bsdus pa ste /
translated: all the maṇḍalas are gathered into Vajracaṇḍa, and so forth.

original: dkyil 'khor pa'i chogs gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor pa'i chogs gzhag par bya'o //
translated: One should place the host of the maṇḍala.

original: yang na bri bar bya zhes bya ba ni tshon rtsi rnams kyis legs par bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang na bri bar bya zhes bya ba ni tshon rtsi rnams kyis legs par bri bar bya'o //
translated: Or, one should draw, that is, one should draw well with colors.

original: gnas gang dag tu bri bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: gnas gang dag tu bri bar bya zhe na /
translated: In which places should one draw?

original: phyogs rnams kun du ston pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs rnams kun du ston pa'o //
translated: The teacher in all directions.

original: zhes bya ba ste phyogs bzhi rnams su dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ston pa po ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste phyogs bzhi rnams su dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ston pa po ste /
translated: In the four directions, the teacher of glorious Vajrasattva.

original: rjes su ston pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rjes su ston pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “teacher” is “one who teaches.”

original: ji ltar gang du dgod ces rtog pa dag gi phyir /
analyzed: ji ltar gang du dgod ces rtog pa dag gi phyir /
translated: In order to think about how and where to place,

original: mdun du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: mdun du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: in front, etc.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i mdun gyi ngos la rdo rje yid las byung ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis gzhu bsnams pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i mdun gyi ngos la rdo rje yid las byung ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis gzhu bsnams pa /
translated: In front of the Blessed One, Vajrasattva, one should place Vajracaṇḍa, Vajrasattva with the crown of the five buddhas, holding a bow with a vajra fist on the left,

original: phyag @78b g-yas pas mda' gsor bar brtson pa sku mdog dmar skya dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag @78b g-yas pas mda' gsor bar brtson pa sku mdog dmar skya dgod par bya'o //
translated: and with the right hand drawing an arrow, red in color, and smiling.

original: sangs rgyas kyi ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i g-yas logs su rdo rje k'i li k'i la sku thams cad la kun nas 'khyud pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i g-yas logs su rdo rje k'i li k'i la sku thams cad la kun nas 'khyud pa /
translated: The phrase the Buddha's and so forth. To the right of glorious Vajrasattva is Vajra Kaliika, embracing the entire body.

original: phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bcings pas thugs ka'i phyogs su 'khyud pa /
analyzed: phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bcings pas thugs ka'i phyogs su 'khyud pa /
translated: With two arms, she embraces him at the heart with a vajra fist.

original: sku mdog de nyid dang 'dra bar dmar skya bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sku mdog de nyid dang 'dra bar dmar skya bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Her body color is the same as his, meaning that she is pale red.

original: rdo rje gzugs zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa ste dang po'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gzugs zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa ste dang po'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The phrase vajra form refers to a five-pronged vajra, which is the first vajra.

original: sku mdog ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: sku mdog ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is its body color like?

original: nyi ma'i 'od can zhes bya ba gsungs te /🔽nyi ma ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od can zhes bya ba gsungs te / nyi ma ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The phrase having the light of the sun is stated.

original: de'i 'od ni mdangs te 'od dmar po'o //
analyzed: de'i 'od ni mdangs te 'od dmar po'o //
translated: The sun is the sun mandala, and its light is its radiance, which is red light.

original: des na nyi ma'i 'od lta bu'i 'od yod pas na de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: des na nyi ma'i 'od lta bu'i 'od yod pas na de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called having the light of the sun because it has a light like the sun's.

original: rgyab tu zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyab tu rdo rje 'dod pa phyag g-yas pa na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa /
analyzed: rgyab tu zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyab tu rdo rje 'dod pa phyag g-yas pa na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa /
translated: The phrase in the back means that behind glorious Vajrasattva is Vajra Kama, holding a makara banner in his right hand.

original: g-yon pa gdan la brten pa dang bcas pa sku mdog sdo skya dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa gdan la brten pa dang bcas pa sku mdog sdo skya dgod par bya'o //
translated: and the left one resting on a seat, and he should be painted pale red in color.

original: g-yon du zhes pa la sogs pa la dang la rdo rje sems dpa'i g-yon du rdo rje snyems pa rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis bsnams nas rked pa'i phyogs gnyis su snyems par 'dzin pa /
analyzed: g-yon du zhes pa la sogs pa la dang la rdo rje sems dpa'i g-yon du rdo rje snyems pa rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis bsnams nas rked pa'i phyogs gnyis su snyems par 'dzin pa /
translated: In the left, etc. In the left of Vajrasattva, Vajragarva should be painted or drawn holding two five-pronged vajras with two vajra fists, holding them in a haughty manner on both sides of the waist,

analyzed: gser btso ma'i mdog 'dra ba dgod pa'am bri bar bya'o //

original: sangs rgyas kyi ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the east, etc.🔽In the east of the glorious Vajrasattva maṇḍala, as before, Vajrahāsa should be painted or drawn holding a vajra-banner with two vajra fists,🔽in the southeast corner Vajramaka should be painted or drawn holding a vajra-lotus with two vajra fists,🔽in the south Vajrāveśa should be painted or drawn holding a vajra-conch with two vajra fists,🔽in the southwest corner Vajrāloka should be painted or drawn holding a vajra-sun with two vajra fists,

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams su rdo rje sbrang rtsi thal mo khong stong kha phye bas spyi bo'i phyogs su rdo rje me tog gi tshogs thogs pa dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su rdo rje sbreng ba'i sprin gyi bdug pa'i spos khang thogs pa'o //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams su rdo rje sbrang rtsi thal mo khong stong kha phye bas spyi bo'i phyogs su rdo rje me tog gi tshogs thogs pa dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su rdo rje sbreng ba'i sprin gyi bdug pa'i spos khang thogs pa'o //
translated: in the west Vajraviśva should be painted or drawn holding a vajra-wheel with two vajra fists,🔽in the northwest corner Vajraketu should be painted or drawn holding a vajra-banner with two vajra fists,🔽in the north Vajrabhāṣa should be painted or drawn holding a vajra-bell with two vajra fists,🔽in the northeast corner Vajrayu should be painted or drawn holding a vajra-sword with two vajra fists,🔽in the east of the glorious Vajrasattva maṇḍala, as before, Vajramaṇi should be painted or drawn holding a vajra-jewel with two vajra fists,🔽in the southeast corner Vajrapuṣpa should be painted or drawn holding a heap of vajra-flowers with two vajra fists in the head region, and in the southwest quarter Vajrapuṣpamegha should be painted or drawn holding a vajra-incense censer of a cloud of flowers.

original: nub byang mtshams su rdo rje ston pa snga ma bzhin du me mar gyi sdong bu 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: nub byang mtshams su rdo rje ston pa snga ma bzhin du me mar gyi sdong bu 'dzin pa'o //
translated: In the northwest corner, Vajra-teacher, as before, holding a lamp wick.

original: byang shar gyi mtshams su rdo rje dgun de bzhin du dri'i dung chos thogs par dgod pa'am bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang shar gyi mtshams su rdo rje dgun de bzhin du dri'i dung chos thogs par dgod pa'am bri bar bya'o //
translated: In the northeast corner, Vajra-winter, as before, holding a perfume conch.

original: phyi'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu la me'i phyogs mtshams su rdo rje sgeg mo rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje gnyis thogs nas rdo rje snyems par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: phyi'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu la me'i phyogs mtshams su rdo rje sgeg mo rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje gnyis thogs nas rdo rje snyems par gnas pa'o //
translated: “In the outer maṇḍala,” and so on. In the outer maṇḍala, on the deity’s platform, in the southeast corner, Vajra-charm, holding two vajras with two vajra fists, abiding in the pride of a vajra.

original: bden bral gyi phyogs su rdo rje bzhad pa dang / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis so'i phreng ba gnyis dang ldan pa'i rdo rje gnyis thogs nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa 'dzum zhing ngo mtshar du gyur pa la rab tu 'jog pa'o //

translated: In the southwest corner, Vajra-smile, holding two vajras with two vajra fists, endowed with two rows of teeth, and placing the glorious Vajrasattva and so on in wonder and delight.

original: rlung gi phyogs su rdo rje glu @79a * //
analyzed: rlung gi phyogs su rdo rje glu @79a * //
translated: In the northwest corner, Vajra-song, holding a lute with two vajra fists, and singing the song of the three vajras.

original: chen po rdo rje pi wang brdung ba'o //
analyzed: chen po rdo rje pi wang brdung ba'o //
translated: The great one is the vajra lute player.

original: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su rdo rje gar lag pa gnyis ni rdo rje rtse gsum pa gnyis thogs te gar byed pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bri bar bya'o //

original: nub tu rdo rje dri /

original: byang du rdo rje ro kun du bri bar bya ste /
analyzed: byang du rdo rje ro kun du bri bar bya ste /

analyzed: 'di dag kyang go rims ji lta ba bzhin du me long dang / pi wang dang / dri'i dung chos dang / ro'i snod dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: These should all be drawn in their respective places, with a mirror, a lute, a perfume conch, and a vessel of food.

original: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor can brgyad ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor can brgyad ni //

analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin sogs bri bar bya //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: rdo rje thig gi nang gi shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te /

analyzed: rdo rje 'khor lo thams cad du //

analyzed: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin gyis bskor //

analyzed: g-yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin bri bar bya'o ;

original: / de ltar na /
analyzed: / de ltar na /

analyzed: @79b zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu la 'dod pa'i dbang phyug nas brtsams te /

analyzed: mdun du 'jig rten gsum rgyal po //

analyzed: 'dod pa tshangs pa zhi byed mchog / ces bya ba ni phyi'i lha'i snam bu'i shar phyogs nas mdun du'o //

analyzed: mchog ces bya ba'i sgras ni khyab 'jug dang / skem byed dang / brgya byin la bya ste /
translated: The word “supreme” refers to Viṣṇu, Rudra, and Śakra,

analyzed: de dag kyang bri bar bya'o // zhes bya ba'i don te //

translated: On the outer mandala platform, one should draw in the east Kāmeśvara, Brahmā, Maheśvara, Viṣṇu, Skanda, and Indra with his wife.

analyzed: lho phyogs su ni zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / spen pa dang / mig dmar ro //
translated: In the south, one should draw the moon, the sun, Saturn, and Mars.

analyzed: byang du phag dang / gshin rje dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang / chu lha chud ma dang bcas par bri bar bya'o //

analyzed: de dag thams cad kyang yi ge h'um nyid kyis dgod par bya'o //

analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi nye bar dgod pa yin par shes par bya'o //

translated: First of all means that having entered, one will be adorned and honored, and so forth. As long as one has not performed the extensive rite, merely by entering one will obtain the result of being a master, and that is the result of entering the mandala. In order to generate enthusiasm,

analyzed: sogs pa gsungs te /

translated: The vajra master who has entered by the rite of entry that will be explained is

analyzed: zhes byang la rdo rje yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na rdo rje chen po ste /

analyzed: de bzhin nyid do //

translated: The master who has the accouterments of Vajrasattva by means of that great vajra is the great vajra master.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon dang zhes bya ba la dkyil 'khor thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon zhes bya ba'i don to // dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon dang zhes bya ba la dkyil 'khor thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor te /
translated: This means the master of the mandala of Vajrasattva.🔽The master of all mandalas is Vairochana's mandala.

original: der slob dpon du gyur pas na dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon no //
analyzed: der slob dpon du gyur pas na dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon no //
translated: Since he becomes the master of that, he is the master of all mandalas.

original: dam tshig thams cad shes pa dang // zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dam tshig thams cad shes pa dang // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He knows all the commitments.

original: dam tshig kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas dam tshig thams cad de gdug pa rnams 'dul ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dam tshig kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas dam tshig thams cad de gdug pa rnams 'dul ba'i phyir /
translated: He is committed to all, because he is committed to subduing the wicked.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bsgo ba'i tshul lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bsgo ba'i tshul lo //
translated: This is the way of the Tathagata's command.

original: de la rjes su 'jug cing de dag shes pas na dam tshig thams cad shes pa ste /
analyzed: de la rjes su 'jug cing de dag shes pas na dam tshig thams cad shes pa ste /
translated: Since he engages in those and knows them, he is one who knows all the pledges.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that he is the master of the maṇḍala of Vajrahūṃkara.

original: chos thams cad rig pa dang zhes bya ba ni stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa dang / padma'i rigs kyi chos thams cad de /
analyzed: chos thams cad rig pa dang zhes bya ba ni stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa dang / padma'i rigs kyi chos thams cad de /
translated: With respect to knowing all the Dharmas, the Dharmas of the lotus family are the powers, the fearlessnesses, and so forth.

original: de dag thams cad rig cing khong du chud pas na chos thams cad rig pa ste /
analyzed: de dag thams cad rig cing khong du chud pas na chos thams cad rig pa ste /
translated: Since he knows and comprehends all of them, he is one who knows all the Dharmas.

original: padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du 'gyur ro zhes ston par gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du 'gyur ro zhes ston par gyur pa yin no //
translated: The meaning is that he is the master of the maṇḍala of the lotus family.

original: las thams cad sgrub pa dang zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i las gang dag gsungs pa'i las de dag thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pas na /
analyzed: las thams cad sgrub pa dang zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i las gang dag gsungs pa'i las de dag thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pas na /
translated: With respect to accomplishing all activities, since he accomplishes all the activities that the Bhagavān Akāśagarbha has taught,

original: de'i phyir las thams cad bsgrub pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir las thams cad bsgrub pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: he is one who accomplishes all activities.

original: rin po che'i rigs kyi slob dpon zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rin po che'i rigs kyi slob dpon zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that he is the master of the jewel family.

original: dngos grub thams cad grub pa dang // zhes bya ba la dngos grub kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas dngos grub thams cad de /
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad grub pa dang // zhes bya ba la dngos grub kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas dngos grub thams cad de /
translated: means that since they are both accomplishments and all, they are all accomplishments.

original: dkyil 'khor lhag ma grub pa gang yin pa de ni dngos grub thams cad grub pa ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor lhag ma grub pa gang yin pa de ni dngos grub thams cad grub pa ste /
translated: That which is accomplished is the remaining maṇḍala, which is all accomplishments.

original: dkyil 'khor lhag ma rnams grub pas grub pa zhes bya @80b ba'i don to //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor lhag ma rnams grub pas grub pa zhes bya @80b ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “accomplished” is that the remaining maṇḍalas are accomplished.

original: de bas na de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas byin gyis brlabs pa ni /
analyzed: de bas na de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas byin gyis brlabs pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the Bhagavān Vajrasattva’s consecration is🔽endowed with the power of all families, maṇḍalas, and deities.

original: rigs dang dkyil 'khor dang lha thams cad kyis nus pa dang ldan par mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rigs dang dkyil 'khor dang lha thams cad kyis nus pa dang ldan par mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar gyur pa nyid kyis na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar gyur pa nyid kyis na /
translated: Since that is the case,

original: dbang bskur ba thams cad 'thob pa zhes bya ba ste /🔽de la dbang bskur ba yang yin la /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba thams cad 'thob pa zhes bya ba ste / de la dbang bskur ba yang yin la /
translated: all consecrations are obtained.

original: thams cad kyang yin pas dbang bskur ba thams cad do //
analyzed: thams cad kyang yin pas dbang bskur ba thams cad do //
translated: Therein, since they are both consecrations and all, they are all consecrations.

original: de yang phyi dang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba gang rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa de dag thams cad thob pa'o //
analyzed: de yang phyi dang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba gang rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa de dag thams cad thob pa'o //
translated: Moreover, all the mandalas of any kind of outer and secret empowerment conferral are obtained.

original: thams cad shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Possessing all knowledge means

original: 'dis dkyil 'khor la sogs pa thams cad shes pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis dkyil 'khor la sogs pa thams cad shes pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: that one possesses the knowledge of all mandalas and so forth.

original: mchod pa thams cad ni mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod pa ste /
analyzed: mchod pa thams cad ni mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod pa ste /
translated: All worship is worship with all worship,

original: thams cad kyi mchod pa de nyid dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dkyil 'khor thams cad 'dis dbang du 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: thams cad kyi mchod pa de nyid dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dkyil 'khor thams cad 'dis dbang du 'gyur zhing /
translated: and that very worship of all is the subjugation of all mandalas, both mundane and supramundane, and

original: rang la rag las par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang la rag las par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will be dependent on oneself.

original: de bas na rgyu de lta bus 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na rgyu de lta bus 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, by such a cause, all mundane and supramundane siddhis will be accomplished.

original: 'di'i phyag rgya thams cad kyang rang nyid bcings pas 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di'i phyag rgya thams cad kyang rang nyid bcings pas 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: And all the mudras of this [master] will be accomplished by binding oneself.

original: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya thams cad rang nyid kyis rang nyid la bcings na 'di'i dngos grub rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya thams cad rang nyid kyis rang nyid la bcings na 'di'i dngos grub rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: If all the seals, such as the great seal, are sealed by oneself to oneself, one will accomplish the powers of this [tantra].

original: dam tshig thams cad kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dam tshig thams cad kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As for all pledges, etc.

original: lus la dmigs pa la sogs pa dam tshig las 'da' bar byed pa ni nyes pa dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: lus la dmigs pa la sogs pa dam tshig las 'da' bar byed pa ni nyes pa dang bcas pa ste /
translated: One who transgresses the pledges, such as focusing on the body, is at fault.

original: de nyes pa dang bcas su zin kyang ;
analyzed: de nyes pa dang bcas su zin kyang ;
translated: Even though one is at fault,

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'i byin gyi rlabs kyis dam tshig thams cad byin gyis brlabs par rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'i byin gyi rlabs kyis dam tshig thams cad byin gyis brlabs par rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: one should understand that all pledges are blessed by the blessing of the seal of glorious Vajrasattva.

original: de yang dam tshig thams cad ni //
analyzed: de yang dam tshig thams cad ni //
translated: Moreover, all pledges

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ste /
translated: are glorious Vajrasattva, etc.

original: de sgrub pa po'i rgyud la so sor snang ba'i sbyor bas gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de sgrub pa po'i rgyud la so sor snang ba'i sbyor bas gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One should understand that they will abide in the continuum of the practitioner through the yoga of appearing individually.

original: ma bslabs par yang thams cad shes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ma bslabs par yang thams cad shes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Even without training, one will know all.

original: de nas bstan bcos la sogs pa ma bslabs par yang de rnams kyis byin gyis brlab par mdzad pa'i mthus thams cad shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas bstan bcos la sogs pa ma bslabs par yang de rnams kyis byin gyis brlab par mdzad pa'i mthus thams cad shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, without studying treatises and so on, by the power of their blessing, one will know everything.

original: mchod pa thams cad ni rnam pa bcu gnyis te /🔽rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams so //
analyzed: mchod pa thams cad ni rnam pa bcu gnyis te / rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams so //
translated: All worship is of twelve kinds:🔽worship with the vajra weapon and so on.

original: de la sogs pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de la sogs pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Among them, and so on means and so on with the vajra flower and so on.

original: bya ba thams cad ni bya ba gang @81a * //
analyzed: bya ba thams cad ni bya ba gang @81a * //
translated: All activities are those activities that are to be performed, such as the activities of the five families, and so on.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa 'grub pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / de lta bu'i bya ba thams cad kyang 'di la 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa 'grub pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / de lta bu'i bya ba thams cad kyang 'di la 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: The nature of the accomplishment of the vajra being and so on is the accomplishment of all such activities.

original: mdor na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mdor na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In brief, and so on.

original: rgya cher bshad pa por nas tha mal pa'i rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa dngos grub kyi mchog ston par mdzad pa ni mdor bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: rgya cher bshad pa por nas tha mal pa'i rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa dngos grub kyi mchog ston par mdzad pa ni mdor bsdus pa ste /
translated: Having explained in detail, the teacher of the supreme spiritual power of the ordinary vajra holder and so on is the concise version.

original: mdor bsdus pa des mdor bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa des mdor bsdus pa'o //
translated: By that concise version, it is concise.

original: tshe 'di nyid la zhes bya ba ni da ltar byung ba'i dus te /
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid la zhes bya ba ni da ltar byung ba'i dus te /
translated: In this very life means the present time.

original: bdag nyid kyi dngos po gang gis dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs pa de nyid kyis rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa dngos grub kyi mchog thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi dngos po gang gis dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs pa de nyid kyis rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa dngos grub kyi mchog thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: By that very nature of one's own, having entered this great maṇḍala, one will attain the supreme accomplishment of a vajra holder, and so forth.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said, just as one desires.

original: de'i 'dod pa ji lta bus ji lta ba 'dod pa de lta bu nyid kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i 'dod pa ji lta bus ji lta ba 'dod pa de lta bu nyid kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: By whatever desire of his, just as one desires, one will attain that very accomplishment.

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate just that accomplishment of one's desire,

original: sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: it is said, one will attain buddhahood or the state of Vajradhara.

original: de la sangs rgyas nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po nyid do //
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po nyid do //
translated: There, buddhahood is the state of the five tathāgatas.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid ni rigs thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid de /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid ni rigs thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid de /
translated: The state of Vajradhara is the nature of all the families.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni rgyu gang gi phyir na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni rgyu gang gi phyir na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i 'bras bu dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa tsam gyis slob dpon la 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /🔽'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te gang gi phyir /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i 'bras bu dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa tsam gyis slob dpon la 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na / 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te gang gi phyir /
translated: If one asks, “Will the result explained above occur just by entering the maṇḍala of the master?”🔽The Bhagavān Vajrasattva, having entered into his heart,

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' h'um gi ngo bo nyid du 'di'i snying la zhugs shing don yod la mi slu ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' h'um gi ngo bo nyid du 'di'i snying la zhugs shing don yod la mi slu ba'i phyir /
translated: because he is unfailing in his purpose,

original: las thams cad la 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i rgyus ni bkug cing spyan drangs te /
analyzed: las thams cad la 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i rgyus ni bkug cing spyan drangs te /
translated: he is summoned and invited by the cause of the result of all activities.

original: de bas na rgyu 'di nyid kyis dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing /
analyzed: de bas na rgyu 'di nyid kyis dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing /
translated: Therefore, by this very cause, he enters the maṇḍala

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ngo bo nyid kyis sems can gyi don to /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ngo bo nyid kyis sems can gyi don to /
translated: and benefits sentient beings by the nature of the mudra of Vajrasattva, and so on.

original: sgrub pa po'i rang dgar dbang du byas la /
analyzed: sgrub pa po'i rang dgar dbang du byas la /
translated: Having brought the practitioner under control,

original: de'i rang bzhin du bsgom pa'i sbyor ba dang / rjes su mnyes par byas te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin du bsgom pa'i sbyor ba dang / rjes su mnyes par byas te /
translated: he meditates on the nature of that and engages in union.

original: de'i phyir bdag nyid slob dpon du gyur nas slob dpon du 'jug cing sgo srung nas brtsams te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag nyid slob dpon du gyur nas slob dpon du 'jug cing sgo srung nas brtsams te /
translated: Therefore, having become the master, he enters the maṇḍala and, beginning with the gatekeeper,

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad bstan par bya zhing /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad bstan par bya zhing /
translated: One should teach all the maṇḍalas,

original: dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsgom pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig par slob dpon byed pa la mnyes par byed pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsgom pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig par slob dpon byed pa la mnyes par byed pa'o //
translated: and one should please the master by training in the single-pointed mind of meditation on the maṇḍala.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub kyang de nyid kyis bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur zhing rdzogs par 'gyur bas bcom ldan 'das de yang de la @81b 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub kyang de nyid kyis bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur zhing rdzogs par 'gyur bas bcom ldan 'das de yang de la @81b 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: Also, the master should accomplish the siddhi of the maṇḍala, and since it will be accomplished and perfected by that, the Bhagavān will also be accomplished in that.

original: de bas na ji skad du gsungs pa'i 'bras bu dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa tsam gyis slob dpon gyis 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na ji skad du gsungs pa'i 'bras bu dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa tsam gyis slob dpon gyis 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the master will obtain the result as taught merely by entering the maṇḍala.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la ni dkyil 'khor bris pa'i rjes thogs nyid la bsdu ba la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du sngon du 'gro bas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du bcug nas bcings la dbang du byas te
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la ni dkyil 'khor bris pa'i rjes thogs nyid la bsdu ba la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du sngon du 'gro bas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du bcug nas bcings la dbang du byas te
translated: Then, immediately after drawing the maṇḍala, having first performed the gathering of the accumulations, and so on, as before, having entered the maṇḍala of the Bhagavān Vajrasattva with retinue, having bound and controlled,

original: / dang por mchod yon phul la /
analyzed: / dang por mchod yon phul la /
translated: first offer the drinking water.

original: rdo rje phyag rgya dang dang po'i rdo rje'i mtshan nyid can bcings pa dang po'i ste /🔽thog mar byas la phyag rgya gzhan dag bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor du 'jug par byas nas h'um zlos shing /
analyzed: rdo rje phyag rgya dang dang po'i rdo rje'i mtshan nyid can bcings pa dang po'i ste / thog mar byas la phyag rgya gzhan dag bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor du 'jug par byas nas h'um zlos shing /
translated: The first is the binding of the vajra fist and the vajra hook.

original: rdo rje lta bas lta bzhin du dkyil 'khor du bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bas lta bzhin du dkyil 'khor du bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Having bound the other seals and entered the maṇḍala, one should accomplish the maṇḍala while reciting hūṃ and looking with the vajra gaze.

original: rdo rje lta ba yang /
analyzed: rdo rje lta ba yang /
translated: The vajra gaze is as follows:

original: chags shing gdangs pa'i mig dag gis //
analyzed: chags shing gdangs pa'i mig dag gis //
translated: With eyes of passion and luster,

original: bud med dag la bltas na ni //
analyzed: bud med dag la bltas na ni //
translated: one should look at women.

original: rtag tu dbang du gyur pa ste //
analyzed: rtag tu dbang du gyur pa ste //
translated: They will always be under one’s control.

original: rdo rje lta ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: rdo rje lta ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: This is the characteristic of the vajra gaze.

original: rdo rje bcing ba bstan byas te //🔽mdzub mo mthe bo'i mngal du ni //
analyzed: rdo rje bcing ba bstan byas te // mdzub mo mthe bo'i mngal du ni //
translated: Having displayed the vajra binding,🔽one should insert the right thumb

original: g-yas pa yi ni mthe bo'i mtshan //
analyzed: g-yas pa yi ni mthe bo'i mtshan //
translated: into the hollow of the left thumb

original: bcug la bskyod cing bsdam par bya //
analyzed: bcug la bskyod cing bsdam par bya //
translated: and shake it while binding.

original: zhes bya ba 'di ni lnga po'i bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di ni lnga po'i bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is the seal called “the collection of the five.”

original: lnga po bsdus pa bcings nas ni //
analyzed: lnga po bsdus pa bcings nas ni //
translated: Having bound the collection of the five,

original: gung bsgreng srin lag nang du gzhug / mthe bo mthe'u chung bsnyams rdo rje //
analyzed: gung bsgreng srin lag nang du gzhug / mthe bo mthe'u chung bsnyams rdo rje //
translated: The middle finger is inserted in the ring finger, and the thumb and little finger are even.🔽This is the supreme first vajra.

original: de ni dang po'i rdo rje mchog / zhes bya ba 'di ni dang po'i rdo rje'i mtshan nyid do //🔽de nas rdo rje rnam par sgeg pa'i phyag rgya dang / bzlas brjod lan cig byas la phyag bya zhing zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang yi ge h'um zlos shing dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu ji lta ba bzhin bsgrubs la /
analyzed: de ni dang po'i rdo rje mchog / zhes bya ba 'di ni dang po'i rdo rje'i mtshan nyid do // de nas rdo rje rnam par sgeg pa'i phyag rgya dang / bzlas brjod lan cig byas la phyag bya zhing zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang yi ge h'um zlos shing dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu ji lta ba bzhin bsgrubs la /
translated: This is the definition of the first vajra.🔽Then, with the mudra of the vajra-playful one and reciting the mantra once, one should make obeisance.

original: rang gi lce la yi ge h'um las gnod mdzes kyi rdo rje bsams la /
analyzed: rang gi lce la yi ge h'um las gnod mdzes kyi rdo rje bsams la /
translated: Having accomplished the entire maṇḍala just as it is with such a vajra mudrā and reciting the syllable hūṃ, one should visualize the vajra of Sumbha-ni-vāraṇa on one’s tongue from the syllable hūṃ.

original: badzra dzi hva zhes byin gyis brlabs la /
analyzed: badzra dzi hva zhes byin gyis brlabs la /
translated: Blessing it with vajra-jihva,

original: dkyil 'khor pa'i lha thams cad kyi ljags la h'um dang bcas par bsams la lha thams cad las kyi phyag rgya nye bar bstan te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po ji skad bshad pa bcings shing bstan la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor pa'i lha thams cad kyi ljags la h'um dang bcas par bsams la lha thams cad las kyi phyag rgya nye bar bstan te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po ji skad bshad pa bcings shing bstan la /
translated: one should visualize hūṃ on the tongues of all the maṇḍala deities and display the karma mudrā of all the deities. Having bound and displayed the mudrā of the Bhagavān as explained,

original: lhag ma rnams kyis kyang ji ltar bris pa dang rjes su mthun par yi ge h'um zlos shing phyag rgya chen po de dag nyid la nye bar bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams kyis kyang ji ltar bris pa dang rjes su mthun par yi ge h'um zlos shing phyag rgya chen po de dag nyid la nye bar bstan par bya'o //
translated: The rest should also be taught the great seal of the hum syllable, in accordance with the way it was written.

original: de nas dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur nas bum pa rnams dang / phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnams kyis kyang yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: de nas dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur nas bum pa rnams dang / phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnams kyis kyang yang dag par mchod la /
translated: Then, having conferred empowerment on all of them with the empowerment mudras, just as it is, one should also make offerings with the vase and the mudra offerings.

original: de'i rjes thogs nyid du rdo rje rnam par sgeg pa'i phyag rgyas /
analyzed: de'i rjes thogs nyid du rdo rje rnam par sgeg pa'i phyag rgyas /
translated: Then, immediately after that, with the mudra of the vajra-playful one,

original: @82a * // bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te /
analyzed: @82a * // bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te /
translated: one should pay homage to the Bhagavān.

original: de dag kyang 'di'i 'og nas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang 'di'i 'og nas shes par bya'o //
translated: Those should be understood from below.

original: gos dmar po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de ltar phyag rgyas nas /
analyzed: gos dmar po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de ltar phyag rgyas nas /
translated: With respect to “red cloth,” and so on, having made the mudras,

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba chen po dang ldan pa la gos dmar po la h'um ngam rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags lan bdun bzlas la ;
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba chen po dang ldan pa la gos dmar po la h'um ngam rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags lan bdun bzlas la ;
translated: one should recite the hum syllable or the vajra-yakṣa mantra seven times on a red cloth,

original: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bzlas pas kyang de stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs dang ze'u kha dang gdong g-yogs byas la /
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bzlas pas kyang de stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs dang ze'u kha dang gdong g-yogs byas la /
translated: Also, one should recite the vajra hook and so forth, and one should be draped with the upper and lower garments, and one should cover one's face with the veil.🔽One should take the vows with the four prostrations and so forth, and one should wear a flower garland and anoint one's face with perfume, and one should enter oneself with the vajra palms crossed, holding a flower, and dancing and circumambulating with the vajra.

original: phyag bzhi sngon du 'gro ba la sogs pas sdom pa gzung ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba thogs shing gdong dri zhim pos byug pa dang / rdo rje thal mos rdo rje gar byed cing bskor bas snying gar me tog thogs te bdag nyid 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gar las h'um byung ba'i rdo rje thal mos me tog blangs la /
analyzed: phyag bzhi sngon du 'gro ba la sogs pas sdom pa gzung ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba thogs shing gdong dri zhim pos byug pa dang / rdo rje thal mos rdo rje gar byed cing bskor bas snying gar me tog thogs te bdag nyid 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gar las h'um byung ba'i rdo rje thal mos me tog blangs la /
translated: This means that one should take the flower with the vajra palms crossed, which arises from the vajra dance of Vajradharma, and🔽one should enter the mandala, circumambulating and placing it in the region of one's heart, reciting vajra vajra hum.

original: de bskor nas snying ga'i phyogs su bzhag ste badzra badzra h'um zhes 'don zhing dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don te de la rdo rje gar ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de bskor nas snying ga'i phyogs su bzhag ste badzra badzra h'um zhes 'don zhing dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don te de la rdo rje gar ni 'di yin te /
translated: The vajra dance is as follows:

original: lag pa g-yas pa ba dan gsum pa byas la /
analyzed: lag pa g-yas pa ba dan gsum pa byas la /
translated: One should make the three-banner gesture with the right hand.

original: g-yon pa yang ba dan gsum pa yid du byas la de ltar ba dan rtse gsum pa'i mchog gi bsgyings pa dang bcas pas /
analyzed: g-yon pa yang ba dan gsum pa yid du byas la de ltar ba dan rtse gsum pa'i mchog gi bsgyings pa dang bcas pas /
translated: Having made the left one into a three-bannered one, one should imagine it as such, with the three-bannered one having the pride of the best,

original: tha ma la sogs pa nas dgrol bas glog ltar 'degs shing bskor bas gar byed pa 'di ni rdo rje'i gar ro //
analyzed: tha ma la sogs pa nas dgrol bas glog ltar 'degs shing bskor bas gar byed pa 'di ni rdo rje'i gar ro //
translated: and with the end and so forth released, one should dance, lifting and whirling it like lightning. This is the vajra dance.

original: zhugs nas kyang yang rnam par sgeg pas bskor bas bdud bcing zhes bya ba ni ji ltar sngar rdo rje sgeg pas phyag bya bar gsungs pa bzhin du 'dir yang bya'o zhes ston pa yin no //
analyzed: zhugs nas kyang yang rnam par sgeg pas bskor bas bdud bcing zhes bya ba ni ji ltar sngar rdo rje sgeg pas phyag bya bar gsungs pa bzhin du 'dir yang bya'o zhes ston pa yin no //
translated: Having entered, and also having circled with flirtatiousness, one should bind the demons, and so forth. This teaches that just as previously it was taught that one should make obeisance with the vajra flirt, here also one should do that.

original: snying po yang bzlas brjod bya'o zhes bya ba ni h'um bzlas la phyag bya'o zhes ston pa yin no //
analyzed: snying po yang bzlas brjod bya'o zhes bya ba ni h'um bzlas la phyag bya'o zhes ston pa yin no //
translated: One should also recite the essence mantra. This teaches that one should make obeisance with the recitation of hūṃ.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje lta bas bltas te de bzhin du 'dug nas bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni de ltar phyag byas nas bskor ba lan gsum byas la de kho na nyid brjod de me tog dor nas slar blangs la /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje lta bas bltas te de bzhin du 'dug nas bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni de ltar phyag byas nas bskor ba lan gsum byas la de kho na nyid brjod de me tog dor nas slar blangs la /
translated: Then, having gazed at the Bhagavān with the vajra gaze, one should stand as before and accomplish. This teaches that having made obeisance in that way, one should circle three times, recite the truth, cast the flower, and take it back.

original: rang gi mgo la bcings te mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas /
analyzed: rang gi mgo la bcings te mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas /
translated: Having bound it on one’s head, one should praise with the one hundred and eight names.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
translated: Having formed the great seal of the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas bltas la yi ge h'um 'don cing bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas bltas la yi ge h'um 'don cing bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: one should gaze at the Blessed One with the vajra gaze, and one should accomplish [the Blessed One] with the syllable hūṃ.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pas bdag nyid ston par mdzad pa'am /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pas bdag nyid ston par mdzad pa'am /
translated: Then, the Blessed One, being pleased, will show himself,

original: smin ma bskyod pa'am /
analyzed: smin ma bskyod pa'am /
translated: or he will move his brow,🔽or he will move his whole body or all his limbs.

original: lus thams cad dam yan lag thams cad ces bya ba ni gal te zhig na sku thams cad bskyod par 'gyur ba'am /🔽sku'i phyogs gcig @82b bskyod par 'gyur ba'o //🔽kha dog dmar por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sku thams cad dam /
analyzed: lus thams cad dam yan lag thams cad ces bya ba ni gal te zhig na sku thams cad bskyod par 'gyur ba'am / sku'i phyogs gcig @82b bskyod par 'gyur ba'o // kha dog dmar por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sku thams cad dam /
translated: If he moves his whole body,

original: zhal tshom dmar por 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhal tshom dmar por 'gyur ba'o //
translated: or his face will become red.

original: 'od zer gyi rang bzhin gyi zhal lam sku thams cad ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'od zer gyi rang bzhin gyi zhal lam sku thams cad ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: Or he will show a face or a whole body that is the nature of light rays.🔽And he will show immeasurable miracles.

original: cho 'phrul dpag tu med pa yang ston par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni mtshon mo'o //
analyzed: cho 'phrul dpag tu med pa yang ston par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni mtshon mo'o //
translated: This is the night.

original: 'di nyid ni nyin mo'o zhes bye brag shes par mi 'gyur par 'od zer gyis bkug nas 'khrigs pa dang / gang rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las cho 'phrul brgya rtsa brgyad kyi rnam pa gang yin pa de dag kyang ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di nyid ni nyin mo'o zhes bye brag shes par mi 'gyur par 'od zer gyis bkug nas 'khrigs pa dang / gang rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las cho 'phrul brgya rtsa brgyad kyi rnam pa gang yin pa de dag kyang ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: But when it is drawn in and concentrated by the light rays, it will also display the one hundred and eight miracles that are described in the Vajraśekhara Tantra.

original: bdag nyid mthong ba stsol cing dngos grub mchog kyang stsol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bdag nyid mthong ba stsol cing dngos grub mchog kyang stsol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It will grant the sight of itself and the supreme spiritual power.

original: rang rang gi gzugs nyid mthong ba stsol ba dang / sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyi dngos grub mchog slob dpon la stsol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang rang gi gzugs nyid mthong ba stsol ba dang / sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyi dngos grub mchog slob dpon la stsol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It will grant the sight of its own form and the supreme spiritual power of buddhahood or Vajradharahood to the master.

original: de nas brtsams te zhes bya ba ni de nas bzung nas so //
analyzed: de nas brtsams te zhes bya ba ni de nas bzung nas so //
translated: From that time on means from that point on.

original: nyin re zhing dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub rnams dang / 'jig rten pa rnams kyang nyin re zhing slob dpon la 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: nyin re zhing dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub rnams dang / 'jig rten pa rnams kyang nyin re zhing slob dpon la 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: One attains all powers day by day means that one attains the powers of the maṇḍala of all the clans, and also the mundane powers day by day from the master.

original: gang du zhugs pa tsam gyis mi tshugs pa dang / mi sod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni der rang nyid zhugs pa'o zhes snga ma bzhin du rgyud dang sbyar te /
analyzed: gang du zhugs pa tsam gyis mi tshugs pa dang / mi sod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni der rang nyid zhugs pa'o zhes snga ma bzhin du rgyud dang sbyar te /
translated: One becomes invincible and unassailable merely by entering it means that one enters it oneself, as before, in connection with the tantra.

original: gang zhig dkyil 'khor 'di la zhugs pa tsam gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba 'di ni /🔽gang bdud la sogs pas zil gyis mi gnod cing tshugs par mi 'gyur ba dang / de nyid kyis kyang mi bsod pa ste /
analyzed: gang zhig dkyil 'khor 'di la zhugs pa tsam gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba 'di ni / gang bdud la sogs pas zil gyis mi gnod cing tshugs par mi 'gyur ba dang / de nyid kyis kyang mi bsod pa ste /
translated: One becomes invincible merely by entering this maṇḍala.🔽 One is not harmed by any demons, etc., and one becomes invincible.

original: bsad par mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: bsad par mi nus pa'o //
translated: By that, one is also unassailable, meaning that one cannot be killed.

original: dngos grub thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rdzogs pa'o //
translated: All powers means the perfection of the seal of Śrī Vajrasattva, etc.

original: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni /
translated: All perfections means

original: de dag nyid kyi 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: de dag nyid kyi 'byor pa'o //
translated: their wealth.

original: ye shes thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ye shes thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: All wisdom means

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub kyi sems rdzogs par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub kyi sems rdzogs par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: the wisdom of glorious Vajrasattva and so forth, and the perfection of the thought of enlightenment and so forth.

original: bya ba thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i tshul te /
analyzed: bya ba thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i tshul te /
translated: All activities means the way of accomplishing the welfare of sentient beings by means of the emanations of the Buddhas.

original: de dag bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' slob dpon la bsgrub par mdzad cing rdzogs par mdzad do //
analyzed: de dag bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' slob dpon la bsgrub par mdzad cing rdzogs par mdzad do //
translated: The Blessed One, Vajrasattva, accomplishes and perfects them in the master.

original: der de lta bu'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa'i slob dpon gyis rang nyid 'jug par bya'o //🔽de nas yang dag par mchod la zhes bya ba ni dngos grub thams cad rab tu bsgrub par mdzad pa /
